LSTM Sequence Modeling for Fraud Detection

Temporal fraud detection using LSTM networks with attention mechanism for sequence-based transaction analysis.

Started: January 1, 2025
Completed: January 31, 2025
GitHub Repository

Tags

Technologies

Overview

Temporal fraud detection using LSTM networks with attention mechanism for sequence-based transaction analysis.

Project Details

This project is part of the 30-day portfolio journey focusing on fraud-detection.

  • TensorFlow
